captions.text: Hello everybody, my name is Markiplier and welcome to Bunker 16, an indie horror game that I actually vetted
and is actually highly reviewed, so let's get into it.
Well, I mean not like the past games that I have played haven't been that all-
Excuse me? Why is there a seperate mechanic to open the handle? Oh. Ohh ok
Well how complicated do you want me to make this f-for me? How compli- Nevermind, I can't talk today
Either way, I figured that I'm gonna be wandering around for a while.
So let's get nice and comfortable in this eerie and destitude environ-
Someone can't be jumping out at me this early.
Ok, so toilets, good. Toilets... OH! Oh, that's a shower!
Ok, that's for couples who can't stand away from each other and they wanna hold hands while one is dumping and one takes a shower.
Isn't that adorbuuuh... Isn't that adorbughhh
So the story of this game is that this dude was running away from the storm and wanted to take shelter in some place
Are you me?! Or is that some other guy who got trapped in here like a poor sap?
Hey... he, wo- w- hey woh hey
Don't be jumpin me up stuff and things!
I don't much care for it- wait, do these actually...
Does my- does my flashlight have a strobe-function?
Is that really what I have there?
And that sounds creeeepy and craaaawly, and creaky
S'creepy, spooky skeletons gonna come jumping out at meee
Weeell, I got sum' bad news about that
Oh, I can actually open the trash- whoa, I can open everything!
That's kind of awesome by itself, that's a little detail that I haven't seen before
Ooh, I got it! So I gotta go find the fuses
Looks like one's already in there
Oh! Ah, so I have one fuuuse
I didn't know if I grabbed the fuse already
So that's gonna turn on the thing so that I can get out of here
Are the coffee cups a fuuuses?
But I hear a grumbly gro-
Whatcha doin' on down there, don't be messing with my light
If not dissuase you completely from eating my bones
I can't have that? Aah, I don't need it.
I'm too much of a badass to need a medkit
Cuz' I have no idea at the moment
More medkit-things, but I can't- like there's a lot of stuff to open, but I can't seem to get anything out of 'em
I don't know about no windows - this little gunhole, if you weren't so...
uuh... inflexible, you could probably squeeze your way through there
Wait a minute, is that a thing? Ok.
There's a lot of detail put into this.
Imagine if this was an Oculus Rift-port, I would get very claustrophobic in this, because I actually do get cla-
Oh. That's just a buzzy-buzz, I thought that was a groan
K, is there actually gonna be something in here, because I don't know what I'm looking for.
What do you mean, you were taking a hike?
Why would anyone be so scared of the rain that they would just go in a bunker?
I guess, if the preference, and you didn't know that you were about to be murdalised by a giant monster- but I mean still
I am glad that there have been a few more of these... actually- what does it say?
What does that say on that?!
I am glad there are a few more of these actual, quality horror-games- oh I just made a circle.
Wha- oh, don't tell me I gotta- uuugh!
I gotta open every single ding-dong-damn box? And barrel, and thing, looking for a fuuuse?
I don't even know where to find a fuuuse.
I don't even know if I'll pick it up automatically or if you're gonna stash it in my face.
Please don't stash it in my face.
Sooo, I need to go back to the kitchen, write down exactly where these things are-
Is it in the kitchen? I don't think it was in the kitchen
Either way, I need to go ba-
Step out into the light, if you wanna face me!
Ah, it was the kitchen, ok
Ok, so there was a kitchen in here and
then there's an office, bedroom, ammuni-
Why wha-- I was in the office
I'm not supposed to get the fuse
Ok, I'm an idiot I'm not supposed to get the fuses
This is where I put the fuses in
So if it's in the kitchen mess then that means it'll actually work right?
What did that do for me?
I'm gonna cook me up some... gumbooo
So I don't have enough fuses but I need to go somewhere else
Try the office cause it was just around the corner right
was that just the ventilation system or is there something actually after me?
So this is the office right?
But, uh, what was the point of that? What was the point?
What was the point of this??
I need to find a key but-
there doesn't seem to be anything actually here
I'll keep trying it back and forth
If there's too much of this wandering about I'm gonna just
you know, just skip to the later...
Ok, I'm gonna find the bedroom
cuz I'm so tired and confused I'll nap on one of their electric vibrating beds
I sure hope they had this in the Nazi times when they built this bunker or something
Like why would a bunker just be in the middle of the woods?
I don't think they are anyway
I don't know if I went this way
Yeah I did cuz that was a claustrophobic area
where was the gosh-- OH this was the bedroom
Oh, OH! Why am I taking a nap?!
Oh, that WAS me- noo, that couldn't have been me
Why did I need the lights on to take a nap, that's seems like counter-intuitive
Is that me- that better be me!
I just gotta say that right now
Ok, I'm really confused- am I George Walker?
So that IS me! I'm finding my own notes
I think- and time is going very strangely here
Soo, are you in the shower or the bathroom, 'cuz that'll affect where I go.
When we hold hands, and do our shower hump- or a- sho- no, not a shower hump, I'd really rather not
Like honest to goodness; this has got a good creep-factor to it.
Sooo, this has changed around, too, huh?
What a bunch of douches if they did-
So, I'm gonna do what it tells me to do, because...
S'this the key to the main door?
Shhuuuuu- scratching the chalkboard on my ear
Stop scratching the chalkboard on my face
You ain't that scary- just 'cuz I screamed like a little girl doesn't mean you're scary
Stop screaming, we all got problems
Stealin' from mah bunker, how dare they?!
Wait, what? That's why you're worried, if they're not- ugh nevermind...
And he's probably in here haunting me for the rest of my days.
Or! You stop being su- what- oh!
I don't remember there being a door back here.
You wouldn't be that big of a douche!
You are EXACTLY that big of a douche!

comments.text:
'Gott mit uns' (GERMAN)

Translation: God with us! (German battle cry, mainly in WW1)

'Dein Ende is nahe Freue dich'

Translation (approx): Your end is getting nearer (then something to do with 
'free')

'Tanz mit uns' 

Translation (guess): I got 'Dance with us' :P

'Komm zu mir' 

Translation: (Literally) Come to me﻿

comments.author: Dice The Dragon

comments.text:
Being crushed in a shrinking room wouldn't be the worst way to die, 
actually. This game showed that your character had a chance of dying of 
thirst, while stuck in a bunker. Being trapped until you die of thirst, it 
makes you cling on to the fear of dying in a slower manner, and even when 
you accept your fate, death by thirst takes longer to kill you than being 
crushed by a shrinking room.﻿

comments.text:
There will always be stupid joke stereotypes out there but it's just for 
fun.

A few examples: Americans are stupid (me), British people have bad 
teeth/hygiene, and the list can go on. The point is that it's all stupid 
jokes and shouldn't be taken seriously :)
comments.author: McClover

comments.text:
+dallas lp Shit happens. Can't let a joke get under your skin.

Besides, anyone who thinks that stereotypes are 100% accurate is, for one, 
not worth your time and, second, too stupid to ever understand, anyway.

Point being, let it go, it's stupid.

comments.author: broliestbrony

comments.text:
If I had to hazard a guess, this is a former Nazi bunker, likely home to a 
particularly insane, sadistic high commanding SS officer who encased his 
victims forcibly in concrete. Your character could be somehow related to 
this man, or perhaps just an unfortunate wanderer of the German countryside 
who stumbled upon this place. Perhaps the ending is the spirits of the dead 
recognizing you were not the one to blame for the horrors that went on here 
and letting you go.﻿
